operations.command:

#!/bin/bash
# Git pre-push hook - calls ClaudeFlow Bug Hunter
~/.claude/hooks/pre-push-review.sh
EOF
chmod +x ~/.claude/hooks/pre-push
git config --global core.hooksPath ~/.claude/hooks && git config --global core.hooksPath

operations.command:
echo "Creating QuestDB quality_scores table..." && curl -s -G "http://localhost:9000/exec" --data-urlencode "query=CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS quality_scores (
  repo SYMBOL,
  total DOUBLE,
  code DOUBLE,
  test DOUBLE,
  data DOUBLE,
  framework DOUBLE,
  pr_number LONG,
  domain SYMBOL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
) TIMESTAMP(timestamp) PARTITION BY DAY;" 2>&1
echo "Verifying table..." && curl -s "http://localhost:9000/exec?query=SHOW%20TABLES" 2>&1 | grep -o "quality_scores" && echo "✅ Table created"

cd /media/sam/1TB/backstage-portal && git add grafana/dashboards/quality-scores.json && git commit -m "feat(grafana): add AI Code Review quality scores dashboard
